title: SPIRITUAL BATH PRODUCTS
author: Reuben Shead
description: Le Bleu Apothecary has a collection of multi-use spiritual bath products that combine aromatherapy, aromalchemy and alchemy to naturally cleanse, protect, bathe, renew balance to the body, spirit and soul. These spiritual bath products make fantastic spiritual gifts. Treat yourself or give as a Spiritual Gift. Le Bleu
cleaned_text: Le Bleu Apothecary has a collection of multi-use spiritual bath products that combine aromatherapy, aromalchemy and alchemy to naturally cleanse, protect, bathe, renew balance to the body, spirit and soul. These spiritual bath products make fantastic spiritual gifts. Treat yourself or give as a Spiritual Gift. Le Bleu Apothecary provides natural spiritual bath products made with essential oils, herbs and aromatherapy that cleanses, heals and protects the mind, soul and body. Our mission is to provide you with the highest quality products for a relaxing, therapeutic self-care experience.
